headline: Will Halliburton's (HAL) Offshore Tech Wins Deepen Its Competitive Moat in Energy Services?
summary: In recent days, Halliburton announced a series of major contract wins with Petrobras for advanced offshore oilfield services in Brazil and delivered a groundbreaking remote-operated subsea installation with Aker BP in Norway. These advancements emphasize Halliburton's increasing technical edge and its ability to implement digital and umbilical-less solutions for complex offshore operations. The collaboration with Aker BP highlights Halliburton's push into digital hydraulic control systems,...

headline: Halliburton awarded multiple contracts by Petrobras
summary: Halliburton (HAL) announced that Petrobras (PBR) (POBR) awarded multiple contracts to provide vessel stimulation, intelligent completions, and safety valves in Brazil’s deepwater fields after a competitive process. In the Buzios field, Halliburton will deploy its SmartWell intelligent completion technology to enable reservoir management and actionable insights. For the Seepia and Atapu fields, Halliburton will provide EcoStar electric tubing retrievable safety valves to improve the safety and ef

raw.summary: Halliburton (HAL) announced that Petrobras (PBR) (POBR) awarded multiple contracts to provide vessel stimulation, intelligent completions, and safety valves in Brazil’s deepwater fields after a competitive process. In the Buzios field, Halliburton will deploy its SmartWell intelligent completion technology to enable reservoir management and actionable insights. headline: Aker BP and Halliburton Execute First Umbilical-Less Tubing Hanger Installation
summary: HOUSTON, October 16, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL), in collaboration with Aker BP, executed the first operation using the Enhanced Remote Operated Control System (eROCS) and Optime Tubing Hanger Orientation System (OTHOS) in the Norwegian continental shelf. The achievement sets a new direction for Halliburton's subsea operations, with broader access to digital control and umbilical-less solutions in offshore regions.

headline: Halliburton secures well service contracts from Petrobras
summary: The contracts will see Halliburton implement its SmartWell intelligent completion technology in the Búzios field.
